global_context.thesis: Fear elevated (39.6), 35% bear. Capitulation entries possible but selective — favor high signal strength + technical confirmation. Healthcare (BAX, AMGN) and tech (INTC, MPWR) lead signal strength. Energy and financials are lower conviction plays.
key_risks: Bear regime with 35% of assets in downtrend — broad rallies unlikely to sustain
VIX at 19.5 suggests elevated but not extreme vol — more downside possible before capitulation
Fear & Greed at 39.6 — fear present but not extreme, no capitulation washout yet
Rate uncertainty and macro headwinds weigh on real estate (ARE) and cyclicals (CCL, BLDR)
Tech sector mixed — INTC turnaround story vs MPWR growth deceleration risk
